statements: SELECT log_id, log_message, timestamp FROM blockchain_logs;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT log_message FROM blockchain_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM blockchain_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM blockchain_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs WHERE log_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT log_message FROM blockchain_logs WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY log_id ASC
SELECT log_id, log_message, timestamp FROM blockchain_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_id DESC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT log_id, CONCAT(log_id, '-', log_message) AS custom_message FROM blockchain_logs WHERE log_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY log_id
SELECT * FROM system_logs;
SELECT log_message, log_time FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT debug_info FROM blockchain_debugging WHERE debug_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY debug_id ASC;
SELECT debug_time, debug_info FROM blockchain_debugging WHERE debug_info ->> 'status' = 'error';
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_time FROM system_logs WHERE log_message ILIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM system_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT log_message, log_time FROM system_logs WHERE log_time > '2021-01-01';
SELECT debug_info FROM blockchain_debugging WHERE debug_id < 100 ORDER BY debug_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT log_time FROM system_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT debug_id, debug_time, debug_info FROM blockchain_debugging WHERE debug_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY debug_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM system_logs;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM system_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM debugging_info WHERE debug_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT op_id, op_type FROM blockchain_operations WHERE op_type = 'transaction' ORDER BY op_id ASC;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM system_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM system_logs JOIN debugging_info ON system_logs.log_id = debugging_info.debug_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_operations WHERE op_type = 'transaction' ORDER BY op_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT op_data->'$.amount' as transaction_amount, op_data->'$.from_address' as sender FROM blockchain_operations WHERE op_type = 'transaction' AND op_data->'$.to_address' = 'recipient_123';
SELECT debug_message, debug_timestamp FROM debugging_info WHERE debug_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY debug_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM system_logs;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT debug_id, debug_message FROM debug_info WHERE debug_status = TRUE;
SELECT operation_type, operation_timestamp FROM blockchain_operations WHERE operation_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT data_id, data_value, data_timestamp FROM monitoring_data WHERE data_category = 'temperature' ORDER BY data_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM system_logs;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM system_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT debug_id, debug_message, debug_status FROM debug_info WHERE debug_status = TRUE;
SELECT operation_type, operation_details FROM blockchain_operations WHERE operation_timestamp < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY operation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_value, data_category FROM monitoring_data WHERE data_category = 'CPU' ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SystemLogs;
SELECT log_type, message FROM DebugInfo ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM BlockchainLogs WHERE block_number > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM TransactionLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT node_id, status, message FROM NodeStatus WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM SystemLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT log_type, message FROM BlockchainLogs WHERE block_number > 100 ORDER BY block_number ASC
SELECT debug_message, operation_name FROM DebugInfo WHERE debug_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT log_description FROM TransactionLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01'
SELECT message FROM NodeStatus WHERE status = 'ACTIVE'
